basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.name: Eugene Bakisov
basics.summary: I've been passionate about programming and tech since the high school. Participated in various competitive programming challenges. Very mindful regarding life/work balance. Eager to learn and share knowledge among colleagues. Was lucky enough to work with very talented colleagues thanks to whom I've greatly improved my soft and hard skills throughout the years.

highlights: First time managing my own domain name and infrastructure
projects.name: Pet project

highlights: My highest amount of refactored code in a single project
projects.name: Java + JQuery

highlights: Own solution for describing a cross-environmental business logic
Own library for a better integration with specific third-party platform
API specification via RAML
projects.name: Java + Angular

highlights: Large number of client specific integration schemes
In-house workflow engine library
projects.name: Clojure + ClojureScript

highlights: Monolithic back-end with configurable parts of functionality
Own UI Kit
projects.name: Clojure + ClojureScript

highlights: Microservice Architecture
High throughput and availability
Saga Orchestration
Multiple Data Centers
projects.name: Java + React

references.name: Kirill Grushetski, Software Architect at ONEiO.
references.reference: It is exciting to work with Eugene, because he is a truly enthusiastic developer: he is always full of ideas, determined to get things done and passionate about the tech he is interested in. He added emotional solidity to the team by being easygoing and understanding. I am happy to work with him again, If I have a chance.

work.name: FreshCode
work.summary: Developing back-end and front-end for San Francisco based solar energy startup.

work.name: Arrival
work.summary: Developing a service platform for companies involved in ARRIVAL's vehicles lifecycle (health monitoring, repairing, technician training and certification, etc). Performed numerous proofs of concepts with various impact on architecture.

highlights: Seamlessly migrated a customer facing service to a new logistics API.
Participated in the design and implementation of a new B2B2C supply delivery chain.
Led major improvement (up to x10 speedup) of workflow for the third-party suppliers.
work.name: Yandex
work.summary: Developing and maintaining a dozen logistics services for the e-commerce marketplace beru.ru (approx 15M customers monthly)

highlights: Improved project's reliability, performance and time to production.
Leaded successful project's migration from Java EE to Spring Boot
Migrated from bare metal to SaaS platform
Mentored new developers
work.name: Sidenis
work.summary: Outsourcing a web application which can be summarized as 'CI/CD for batch developers' for a Swiss reinsurance company.

work.name: Center of Microelectronics and Diagnostics
work.summary: Developing and maintaining computer vision systems for active robotic agents, analysis of video input streams. Researching and applying solutions to the 3D reconstruction problem. Active usage of OpenCV library and C#/Python languages.
